lyrics.text: Lesson 3, An Unknown Goddess.
lyrics.translation: 第三课，一个未知的女神。

lyrics.text: Listen to the tape, then answer the question below.
lyrics.translation: 听录音，然后回答下面的问题。

lyrics.text: How did the archaeologists know that the statue was a goddess?
lyrics.translation: 考古学家是如何知道这尊雕像是女神的？

lyrics.text: Some time ago, an interesting discovery was made by archaeologists on the Aegean island
lyrics.translation: 不久前，考古学家在爱琴海的一个岛屿上做出了一个有趣的发现。

lyrics.text: of Kia.
lyrics.translation: 起亚的

lyrics.text: An American team explored a temple which stands in an ancient city on the promontory of Ia
lyrics.translation: 一个美国团队探索了位于伊亚海角上的一个古城中的寺庙。

lyrics.text: Arena.
lyrics.translation: 竞技场。

lyrics.text: The city at one time must have been prosperous, for it enjoyed a high level of civilization.
lyrics.translation: 这座城市一度必定是繁荣的，因为它享有高度的文明。

lyrics.text: Houses, often three stories high, were built of stone.
lyrics.translation: 房屋，通常为三层高，是用石头建造的。

lyrics.text: They had large rooms with beautifully decorated walls.
lyrics.translation: 他们有装饰精美的大房间。

lyrics.text: The city was even equipped with a drainage system, for a great many clay pipes were found
lyrics.translation: 这座城市甚至配备了排水系统，因为发现了许多陶土管道

lyrics.text: beneath the narrow streets.
lyrics.translation: 在狭窄的街道下面。

lyrics.text: The temple, which the archaeologists explored, was used as a place of worship from the 15th
lyrics.translation: 这座考古学家探索的寺庙，从15世纪起就被用作礼拜场所。

lyrics.text: century BC until Roman times.
lyrics.translation: 公元前直到罗马时代。

lyrics.text: In the most sacred room of the temple, clay fragments of 15 statues were found.
lyrics.translation: 在寺庙最神圣的房间里，发现了15尊雕像的陶土碎片。

lyrics.text: Each of these represented a goddess and had at one time been painted.
lyrics.translation: 这些每一个都代表了一个女神，并且曾经被画过。

lyrics.text: The body of one statue was found among remains dating from the 15th century BC.
lyrics.translation: 一尊雕像的主体在公元前15世纪的遗迹中被发现。

lyrics.text: Its missing head happened to be among remains of the 5th century BC.
lyrics.translation: 它缺失的头部碰巧是公元前5世纪的遗物之一。

lyrics.text: This head must have been found in classical times and carefully preserved.
lyrics.translation: 这颗头颅一定是在古典时期被发现并被精心保存下来的。

lyrics.text: It was very old and precious even then.
lyrics.translation: 它在那时就已经非常古老和珍贵了。

lyrics.text: When the archaeologists reconstructed the fragments, they were amazed to find that the
lyrics.translation: 当考古学家们重建这些碎片时，他们惊讶地发现

lyrics.text: goddess turned out to be a very modern looking woman.
lyrics.translation: 女神结果是一位看起来非常现代的女性。

lyrics.text: She stood three feet high and her hands rested on her hips.
lyrics.translation: 她身高三英尺，双手叉腰。

lyrics.text: She was wearing a full length skirt which swept the ground.
lyrics.translation: 她穿着一条扫地的长裙。

lyrics.text: To her great age, she was very graceful indeed.
lyrics.translation: 尽管她年纪很大，但她确实非常优雅。

lyrics.text: But so far, the archaeologists have been unable to discover her identity.
lyrics.translation: 但到目前为止，考古学家们一直无法发现她的身份。
